poemContent: Badges, Strech out like an impression of Sunlight Remind you of a memory of an Imposter's plight In colours and patterns, like a sneer of cold command His bloody life in my Bloody Hands Ionic equations, Hilya you schmuckolia Have a learning Dialogue - Miss Pindolia Auxin shows badges glistening in the wind Like Mr Statin, for he and Gru are twins. Badges Badges, I collect you Chartered streets through the land. Badges, thy split my heart in twain thy slap my visage in shame without you, wrecked is my brain OH WHY DO YOU DRESS ME IN BORROWED ROBES, THANE?! I must confess, that my loneliness, is killing me NOW DON'T YOU KNOW HOW DUMB I FEEL WHEN YOU TAKE THEM AWAY, JUST LIKE YOUR WIGGGGGGGGG Mr Statin, get ready for Cardi B... Big Badges bussin' out the Baddie badges  Man, Balenciaga Badges back and all these witches sucked It's big badges bussin' out the Further Maths, man Positives, vivos, Badges back and all you witches flopped  Rode your 600 shampoos Mr Statin :3 
